name: GORGAN DECKO
description: Driven, successful and dapper, this OG Wall Street trader Gorgan still lives in the 80’s. He loves a polished leather briefcase; a Rolodex and his daily long lunch routine enforces his ‘greed is good’ motto. He's sniffed out the DeFi hype and is ready to short the whole shebang. Get Vitalik on the line, he wants to tell him the good news.
